name: Yomi Kiku Asobi Wii
overview: "Reading Let's Play Wii" with the theme of "Charm of Reading Letter" that enhances the charm of a picture book enriching children's imagination and deepening the bond between parents and children. This work, which is neither a picture book nor video, is equipped with not only reading stories, but also "challenging game" which can be played with the intuitive operation unique to Wii and "challenge game" with motif as a motif. For gimmicks and games, you can enjoy everything in various ways and contents for each talk. The story "Momotaro" is bundled with "Reading Let's Play Wii". Additional story can be downloaded for a fee through Nintendo Wi - Fi connection paid service.
